Paper.Title: References to Named Entities: a Corpus Study

Section.SectionTitle: Abstract References included in multi-document sum-
Section.Paragraph: maries are often problematic. In this paper, we present a corpus study performed to derive a statistical model for the syntactic realization of referential expressions. The interpretation of the probabilistic data helps us gain insight on how extractive summaries can be rewritten in an efficient manner to produce more fluent and easy-to-read text.
